channel.title: Technology Sites Humor Fukung on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Technology Sites Humor Fukung on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: fukung.net - a new face to nata2.info
item.description: I was thinking about how I have a lot of domains that are not being used and how that pisses me off. It is annoying to have a domain that costs 12 bucks or whatever (stupid joker) and isn’t making money - when I could. And a lot of times I am not really mad about it not making money - just mad it isn’t being used. I wish I either had a lot of energy, money, or an extra arm to finish all the sites I want to.
